website_summaries.verdict: A stylish trash can that could turn out to be more fashionable than functional if not handled gently.
pros: Adds a touch of class to the space
cons: Some have said that it does not hold up well over time

customer_reviews.title: Not brown as pictured but definitely worth $12
customer_reviews.text: Overall Its worth $12! Cool earthy look. Common natural weave and fiber. Perfect size for small bathroom trash. It is a natural weave so expect it to have a few small holes in bottoms or sides. Only downside is that the color on the pictures looks like a brown or a natural banana leaf, it is not, it is a tan, very bright color similar to bamboo. (I need brown so I will return) Overall I think it's a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Crooked
customer_reviews.text: Whoever thought it was okay to ship this basket in this condition should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Sinem Arslan

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this one star because it is required. There is nothing wrong with this trash can EXCEPT for the very strong odor. Others describe it as "chemical" but to me it is indescribable, worse than chemical. I did purchase this trash can for a home in the Caribbean so perhaps it is the heat that brought out the odor. Regardless, I had to throw them away because it's too difficult to make a return from across the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is perfect for the bathroom. Color is true. Holds a 4 gal bag, you could go another inch to inch and a half larger in diameter and still use a 4 gal bag. Very sturdy construction, almost like its made of wire, but it's not, should hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Zig

customer_reviews.title: Neutral color, as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Neutral color, as pictured. Perfect size for grocery bags. (banana for scale)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO Soft and pliable
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the pail to be firm and rigid. It is pliable - and rather soft. The weave is nice - I would avoid throwing anything wet and soggy into it. UPDATE: also dont throw anything heavy in it as it will morp the pail out of shape. This item is too soft and pliable for my taste - but it looks good in the room.....so that is the only reason I am keeping it. I am downgrading it from 3 stars to 2 stars....for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Bob

customer_reviews.title: Tightly Woven
customer_reviews.text: Tightly woven to hold trash in. No splayed pieces, appears to be of good quality. Even though I measured the baskets I was replacing this one with and they're the same size, this one is a bit smaller than I expected (the opening doesn't angle out much further, if at all, than the rest of the basket), but it'll work out just fine! The color is only a tad darker than the picture, but it's a great, neutral basket to match any decor.
customer_reviews.author: APIL

customer_reviews.title: Has a plastic lining that is not the most sturdy but since I only dispose lightweight shoe covers not ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with another small basket that I have in my foyer for shoe covers for house guests. This is used to dispose the shoe covers when guest are leaving. Not very big. Has a plastic lining that is not the most sturdy but since I only dispose lightweight shoe covers not damage is done. I is very nice looking and the color gives it a rich look.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: This basket arrived severely distorted. It was not damaged in shipment because the box was in perfect condition. This is an example of poor quality control from the manufacturer. We would have returned the basket to Amazon, but it is so bad that it makes a great conversation piece. If all the baskets from this manufacturer are like this one, I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Slack

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Attractive, Very sturdy.  Adds a nice accent while serving intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, attractive, very sturdy. Dimensions on the product description are fairly accurate. Though it's a little small -- it's not tiny. I was a little hesitant to purchase it since I was concerned it would be too small, but it's actually perfect and very serviceable in a bedroom where you don't have huge amounts of stuff to throw away. It's big enough to discard old magazines, mail and other papers in it, for example, and other things of that sort (covering plastic from dry cleaning and so on). and still have room for more. I use it in my bedroom with the matching magazine rack and they look great together. I am delighted with it and glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction and inflated price.
customer_reviews.text: The grey paper woven basket is of such poor quality that I will have to repair it before I use it! The woven materials are not sufficient to cover the metal frame or “coated” to protect it from moisture. Loose ends are sticking out and not secured! This product is not only over priced but useless as it was sold. It is the second waste basket from this site. The first was an actual grass weaving and a bit more secure but surprisingly heavy because of the rigid metal frame! These are such a disappointment that I would alert customers even if they cost 1/3 of what they were! Beware!
customer_reviews.author: VAL

customer_reviews.title: My gamble paid off
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that mentioned terrible odors as soon as the package was unwrapped and decided to see for myself. I bought two of these waste baskets for an office that I share with my husband. The room is roughly 17x15 and I wanted the color and texture to compliment our wood floors and black desks. There was and is no odor. They are woven tightly so if you are using for paper waste, there is no need to have a "trash bag" liner.
customer_reviews.author: compelled to speak up

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for one bathroom a while back and I liked it so much that I bought another one for the other bathroom. I might even et a third one for the sewing room. My bathroom is pretty small and this is nice and flexible to squeeze it in so i can fit it between the toilet and vanity to get it back in the corner. I like the overall look of it and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this trash can, I have been looking every where for exactly the right size and price. This one seemed perfect. When I received it I was slightly disappointed. I'm using it in my bathroom so I am using a grocery sack liner. It is super flimsy and pieces have been falling off every time I take the bags out. It is also a lot lighter in color than the pictures make it seem. Overall I will be keeping it because it works for now but you definitely get the quality you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Laake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is way sturdier than I thought would be. It’s also more beautiful than our other wicker baskets throughout the house. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie King

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can is perfect for my space and matches my decor! Didnt come damaged at all and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexande1

customer_reviews.title: Nice for BR
customer_reviews.text: Fits in with my bathroom theme and is just as I expected! These things can run over 20.00 in the stores...this is well made and I hope to have it for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the Water Hyacinth color is lighter than the pictures, however I knew that going in and so it is exactly what I wanted! Beautiful weaving and has a removable plastic liner if you want it for trash instead of a plastic bag. Has a typical expected hemp smell, but nothing bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Cute & serves its purpose, could be better
customer_reviews.text: I have this as a little bin in my bedroom to where there's never any wet or food waste going into it, BUT I wish there was a way to have a trashbag line in it. Additionally, after months of minimal use, the weaving is starting to look sparse on the frame/shifting downwards hence why i don't find it as durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and serves its purpose. I was hoping it would be darker to use it in the master bathroom, but turns out it’s perfect for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Seek Him always!

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and well-made basket. It has a heavy frame and will not tip over. Someone commented that it had an odor and it does but it is a fresh straw or hay odor as one would expect from a newly made wicker basket, no surprise. I think it is well worth the money. You couldn't find one like this, for this price, in the stores. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rabbit

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured and pretty low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not as dark as it appears in the photos; it is MUCH lighter. It also arrived with several pieces of the woven wicker sticking out at odd angles that, when touched, broke off very easily. It is not tightly woven so there are many holes. I am not satisfied with the quality of this waste basket at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Cute basket
customer_reviews.text: Cute little waste basket. Perfect size for a desk. The color is a little bit lighter than pictured but it's still very cute for the price. It did smell a little bit at first but it totally disappeared within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Capucine M

customer_reviews.title: Cute and decent size, but SO flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and size. That said, it is extremely flimsy. I'm afraid to handle it, it's almost like reinforced paper. If you're using nit for basic paper, q tips, tissues, wrappers it's fine. But if you are looking to throw wet towel, or anything heavy, it's probably not meant for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ormond Family

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are a great deal for the price. They look stylish in my bedroom. I ended up buying two. I will say one of them was a little uneven on the bottom making it not sit flat on the floor but for the price, it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: carmens kindle 3

customer_reviews.title: A lighter brown than I expected but sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the basket came much lighter than the picture expressed, so If the shade is extremely important to you, you may want to verify with seller first. Otherwise, it’s more than I expected. Very sturdy and with a plastic liner that can be easily removed or left inside.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for each bathroom. They’re a little smaller than our previous garbage cans. It overall they look really great and I’m very happy with this purchase. Seems to be made well, nothing is coming undone as of yet. Would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: andRaquelsaid

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, even as a lamp.
customer_reviews.text: My wife made it into a lamp. We have it outside in our gazebo. Looks great with a nice warm glow. Even being outside, it has held up well and looks as good as when we first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Very well done and looks so pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this waste basket, I have it in my kitchen and looks great!! The color is beautiful and it is very well made!! I have the dark color!! Looks fantastic so happy I order it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this trash can. I purchased the Woven Water Hyacinth Wicker Waste Basket, Natural. I am very happy with my purchase. It looks even better in person. I am a fan of the color and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little trash can ... it's really white (not off while or ivory) and nice quality. Exactly what I wanted for my office. Recommend it for anyone looking for a nicer-looking trash can.
customer_reviews.author: javra

customer_reviews.title: Not dark brown at all!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The basket I thought I was buying was browner in the picture that's why I bought it. This one is nothing like the picture. Not happy & I would LOVE to return it but I can't go outside due to illness
customer_reviews.author: MIMI LANIER

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice:)
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and well-made. Nothing particularly amazing about them, but they are exactly what they look like...a neat bathroom size waste bin made of woven something-or-another. Hey, it's always nice when you buy something online and it's what you expect it to be. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Light in color.
customer_reviews.text: The color is way lighter than the picture! I'm not sure i'll keep it. It's very nice but it was actually the color that attracted me to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for a three year old!
customer_reviews.text: This was intended to be a waste basket, but instead contains my three year old's wooden train set. It's the perfect size for the $10 train set from Ikea. A new use for this item, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Rich & Jess

customer_reviews.title: I have only had less then a month. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had less then a month. I have a steam shower and the bottom of the basket has already molded and the color is black. I need a replacement. Not sure why this has happened?
customer_reviews.author: Marnie bailey

customer_reviews.title: Boho woven bucket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! No smell like others stated. I love how it looks and very happy with the price. Matches my bohemian decor in the restroom perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: leyla moon

customer_reviews.title: No smell here, but the quality is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if mine is defective, but it's getting returned. It doesn't look like the picture, it is not tightly woven, there are bulges here and there, doesn't sit flat, it's uneven and there are holes throughout because of the loose weaves. If you get a nice one, it's probably great, if yours is similar to mine, it's not worth the money. On the bright side, it doesn't smell bad like some of the others have complained about.
customer_reviews.author: Gxtr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, about a $5 basket.
customer_reviews.text: Does not look anything like the photo. Sloppy craftsmanship, flimsy. I think they sent the cheaper hyasynth instead of the cat tale. Would be nice if they sent the correct one or credited the price diff.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all, but looks great
customer_reviews.text: This trash can looks great but is very flimsy and lacks as structure. I'm trying to find a plastic one I can put inside so I kept it
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little waste basket. It goes with every color that I have had in my bathroom. It is made so well and looks as though it will last a lifetime. I like to change colors often in my home and I wanted something that would match everything. I am very pleased with it and it will be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. Probably worth about $5. Probably cost about $1 in materials and $0.50 to make. At $20, I feel like I was robbed.
customer_reviews.author: HXR

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for some years now. I am pleased. I would get more if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Grant Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but very loose weave
customer_reviews.text: I had to return and replace the first one they shipped because it was already unraveled when it got here. But it’s really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gennaro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedroom trashcan, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Fits well with my natural-themed bedroom composed of fine floral prints, plants, and woods. Typical size for a bedroom or bathroom trashcan! Perfect if you're looking for something nicer than plastic but not too pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bathroom and it goes well with my decor. I would recommend highly if you need a small waste basket.
customer_reviews.author: bornblonde

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this years ago and still in exellence condition since the day i purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Fine but small
customer_reviews.text: I guess 10" is smaller than I had realized. I have to empty this pretty frequently for a bedroom package. The color of the trash can is lighter than it looked in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Robert OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat lighter color than it appears in photos
customer_reviews.text: The color of the wastebasket was a bit lighter than it appeared in the photos, so it didn’t end up being exactly what I was looking for in my office. Also, there was no structure to it - it was quite floppy and squishy, and it didn’t sit flat on the floor. It might work for some applications, but it wasn’t what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but the top weave is kinda loose. Nonetheless, it’s really nice and sturdy. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: F Offereins

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these baskets for display on top of cabinets in the laundry room. They appear to be well-constructed and look nice. Unfortunately, only one of the two baskets had the two darker rows near the bottom, so displaying them together is less than optimal since the two baskets don't match exactly --- that is why I only gave them a 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaNative

customer_reviews.title: Actual basket color is lighter than picture of product
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed but the color of the actual basket is way lighter than it appears in the picture. I was expecting a rich brown but received a very light colored basket (ordered 3 baskets and all 3 are light).
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate photo
customer_reviews.text: The photo is not accurate. I selected this particular trash can because I liked the color, but instead of getting this warm brown tone, I got a dark blonde colored trash can.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eller

customer_reviews.title: Color is different than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter color wood in person, not what I was expecting. Very light oak color
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is for our master bathroom that's got a beach lighthouse theme. It's really sturdy and holds up well. It's really cute but I wish it was a lil taller.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: Household Essentials Woven Water Hyacinth WIcker Waste Basket
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I was wanting although it was a little pricey, it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome basket/trash can
customer_reviews.text: I love it its perfect for my seashell theme bathroom. The basket is a very good size and it's made very well
customer_reviews.author: F. Bossier

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This did not look like the picture when I got it. The color was off and it was not sturdy enough for use as an office garbage can. It's more like a decorative piece for a plant.
customer_reviews.author: Janel A. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. The plastic liner is a bit weak, but the basket itself is sturdy and I like the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley S

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Not cheap looking! I have a artificial 5ft bamboo tree with a black plastic container. And this basket fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BigCyn1

customer_reviews.title: It holds trash
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my bathroom. I put a plastic bag inside of it and throw my trash in it. So far it's held my trash. Not sure what else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Caladada!

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Sent the wrong color. Doesn’t feel cheap, good size for my bedroom. Sturdy, good material.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Schede

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, practical garbage can
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive "natural"-looking garbage can that goes nicely with wooden decor. Sturdy. Fair price.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Brydon

customer_reviews.title: Reed Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: This trash can looks great and has a removable clear liner inside. Overall, for the price, this is a great trash can!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a boho, neutral feel for my bathroom and this looks great! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised. It is really sturdy and wasn't frayed at all. Really great quality and perfect for our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Moore

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality and I like the way it looks in our bathroom. I'll probably purchase a second one for our other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Look great, very nice look for $9- only giving 4 stars because the bottom weeve was cheaply done and had some bigger holes (but only on the bottom, not on the sides)
customer_reviews.author: C. Major

customer_reviews.title: It does smell! Don't order it together with stuff that could pick up the odor!
customer_reviews.text: It's functional and meets the description, and delivery was fast. However, I didn't read the reviews that mentioned the smell, and that was kind of a shock. Luckily it's spring where I live, so I can leave windows open in the room where I'm using it until the smell dissipates. Other items shipped with it have picked up the odor, so make sure you don't order it together with food, clothing, or anything with fabric. It's also a slightly coarser weave and different color from the photo, and mine is just a little lopsided. That's not unexpected for the price, but the odor is.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: Cute little waste basket.
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made, nothing fraying and no holes. I got it to match other water hyacinth decor in a bedroom and it looks great. It is very small. I definitely waited for it to go on sale due to the small size. It's nice but not exactly an heirloom.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBig Hart

customer_reviews.title: A little on the flimsy side
customer_reviews.text: VERY light weight, flimsy. The weaving is good quality, but it is not, what I would consider, a sturdy basket. Sides can be pushed in. It is not stiff. The color is also lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: BeeWeeZy

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided
customer_reviews.text: Basket is lopsided, depending on which side you're looking at. So, the picture is inaccurate. It's very sturdy and nicely lined.
customer_reviews.author: Shortbread Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the baskets, where you'd otherwise pay $35+ for the same thing at Pottery Barn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured! I have this in my guest bathroom that my two young boys also use every day. This thing is durable! It still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Bath Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color, weave and size. Very sturdy. I use as a bathroom trash can. Stylish. Timeless classic but modern
customer_reviews.author: Leigh James

customer_reviews.title: These are very decorative and sturdy. I have several and use them on my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very decorative and sturdy. I have several and use them on my book shelves in my work room to hold small, messy looking items that I need for sewing projects. They make my work area look much tidier. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly G. Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: We were very surprised by the fine quality of these baskets. We almost did want to use them as waste baskets as they are so nice looking. They metal stiffeners are thick and well made, giving the baskets a solid feel. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas for my mom (don't you judge me; it wasn't her only gift and she asked for waste baskets). These were surprisingly sturdy. I think they'll hold up for a while. They need a liner, but I'm glad I got these
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: More Beautiful In Person
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful in person! It is exactly as described & was delivered on time! I am really happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Zabel

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I love these waste baskets! This was a return order because I liked the first two so much! Much more solid and heavier than I thought they would be. Well made with a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: Very cute waste basket. I use it as a hamper for dirty bibs and burp rags. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: Cute wastebasket for the bathroom! Fits in nicely with farmhouse decor.
customer_reviews.author: CHixon

customer_reviews.title: as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These look just like the picture and are super cute looking
customer_reviews.author: Karli Walton

customer_reviews.title: I felt that the price was very inexpensive for what ...
customer_reviews.text: I felt that the price was very inexpensive for what I got! It's not real decorative but has an understated "attractiveness" to it. Other people have posted about the smell. I only noticed the smell when I stuck my head in the basket. If you're hyper sensitive to smells I can see where this may bother you. In any case it dissipates over time. I would buy this basket again without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: mike robey

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute little waste basket. Wish is came in a bigger size. Came just as described. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect touch of natural in my black and white bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect touch of natural in my black and white bathroom. Love that it has a clear plastic insert that can easily be washed!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This small wastebasket is just what I wanted——sturdy and natural looking for our basement bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible. Look like cheap baskets to pot a plant. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: These basket is really too small for an office waste basket. I will use it for a bathroom. Also, the color is much lighter than the picture online. It is a natural tan with gray/green shades.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Great little wastebasket
customer_reviews.text: Really great seagrass wastebasket. Goes great in our octopus themed bath. Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Elvee

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful accent piece
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my bedroom and living room, I am going to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dale

customer_reviews.title: Waste basket
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it is suprisingly thin. Not worth the price and I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Alcock

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This basket came with a hole in it. It was also flattened from being in the box and there is no way to get it to go back to the correct form. Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but fragile
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but its very fragile, so it's more of a decoration than a heavy use trash can, be sure to use a trash bag lining.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this trash can until my dog decided to chew it. Definitely will be reordering
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Nice look. Decent quality. Price isn't amazing but is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and even better price. Target and bed bath & beyond sell these for $20+. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Jones

customer_reviews.title: waste bin
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like picture. Sturdy too. Don't know what I was thinking tho. We have to line our small trash cans and when I did this one it totally took away from the look I was going for. Would be great if either your not going to use or for paper only.
customer_reviews.author: kathy saldana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bamboo style wastebasket or perhaps even use as a large plant (especially a faux plant) container.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty durable, small wastebaskets
customer_reviews.text: We ought several of these. They are pretty durable, small wastebaskets. I don't recommend them for bathrooms without a liner, but are great for offices or bedrooms where most of the trash is dry/paper
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

product_meta.title: Household Essentials ML-5692 Woven Seagrass Wicker Waste Bin - for Bathrooms and Bedrooms - Natural,Brown,Small
product_meta.description: Style Name:SeagrassInvite the natural beauty and elegance of seagrass into your home with this Natural Wicker Seagrass Waste Bin. Ideal for bathrooms or laundry rooms, its natural beauty transforms the ordinary. Abandon odor-trapping plastic bins and embrace breathable, beautiful tightly-woven seagrass. Bring a bit of tranquility to your home and never view your wastebasket the same way again. Measures 10”h x 10”diameter.
feature_bullets: Stylish round rustic trash can made of natural wicker perfect for the restroom
Sturdy metal wire frame protects basket's shape
Natural wicker with protective coating to prevent mold, mildew, and humidity
Perfect for bedrooms, dorms, bathrooms, or offices
